articles.author: Shelby Mast and Scott Gleeson
articles.title: NCAA Tournament bracketology: Don't sleep on SEC this March Madness - USA TODAY
articles.description: Auburn and Kentucky are good enough to be No. 1 seeds, Tennessee and Arkansas are dangerous. The SEC is the truth and ready to rock in March Madness.
articles.content:
Auburn had its projected No. 1 seed stolen earlier this week by Baylor, following a weekend that saw the Tigers fall on the road vs. Tennessee. 
But falling to the No. 2 line had as much to do with … [+4250 chars]
